import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class Transfers extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ amount: '', fromRef: '', toRef: '', } } render () { return (
Inter-Account Transfers

Inter-Account Transfers

1. Accounts

Transfer From:

Transfer To:

2. Amount

Enter amount to transfer: {this.setState({amount: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.amount} type="text" name="amount" value=""/>

3. References

From Reference: {this.setState({fromRef: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.fromRef} type="text" name="amount" />

To Reference: {this.setState({toRef:e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.toRef} type="text" name="amount" />

Please note

Your transfer may take up to 24 hours to reflect in your account.

) } } export default Transfers
